clues.text: "1600 Penn" is a link at this.gov

one

Force that sends your clothes to the washing machine's perimeter

What a physicist would call the base on which a teeter-totters or a see-saws

rounds.text: The next-to-last line spoken by this man is "I wish I could care what you do or where you go, but I can't"
